items.title: Libyan war crimes suspect arrested in Germany under ICC warrant
items.description: Khaled Mohamed Ali El Hishri is accused of murder, torture and rape at a prison in Tripoli.

items.title: 'There were bodies everywhere': Druze residents describe 'bloodbath' in Syrian city Suweida
items.description: One woman tells the BBC she cowered in her home waiting for gunmen to enter and "decide whether we should live or die".

items.title: What is Trump's vein condition and how serious is it?
items.description: The US president has been diagnosed with chronic venous insufficiency, according to the White House.

items.title: North Korea bans foreigners from seaside resort weeks after opening
items.description: Tourism authorities say foreigners are "temporarily" not allowed to visit the Wonsan Kalma resort.

items.title: Colbert says The Late Show will end after 33 years
items.description: Network CBS called it a financial decision tied to the "challenging backdrop in late night" TV.
